All features: Refined for Victory,Advised by Fnatic
Gaming excellence by Fnatic Pro-Player met INZONE development. INZONE Buds is here through the collaboration.
All your favorite features in the box
Sound Quality
Battery Life
Wearing Comfort & Design
Connection & Usability
Approved by the best, for you
Designed in collaboration with professional gamers to help you get the edge over your rivals.
360 Spatial Sound for Gaming
Always be one step ahead with 360 spatial sound.2,3 Pinpoint opponents, detect direction and distance effortlessly, ensuring you always have the upper hand.
The perfect audio for your ear shape

Create a personalised hearing profile by taking photos of your ears using the 360 Spatial Sound Personalizer feature in the smartphone app.2,3 Then you can enjoy your game with unmatched spatial accuracy.
Optimized for your ear

Every ear perceives sound uniquely. Recognizing this, the INZONE Buds were designed to emit test sounds, using feedback microphones to gauge how they resonate in your ear. Through the INZONE Hub PC software,2 this acoustic insight is transformed into a tailored spatial listening experience, crafted just for you.
Experience 360 Spatial Sound for Gaming
Want to hear how Spatial Sound works with your favorite devices? Put your headphones on and immerse yourself.
Be fully immersed in the gaming experience

By faithfully reproducing every sound within the game, from powerful explosions to subtle footsteps, you'll feel transported into the world of the game. This is made possible through a specially engineered Dynamic Driver X unit that is designed for wide frequency reproduction. The diaphragm structure, which utilizes various materials for both the dome and edge, ensures minimal distortion and a clear sound quality, delivering an unparalleled level of auditory realism.
No distractions and a quality soundscape

Sony's active noise cancellation capability helps to block out background noise, so that you can focus on your game. An 8.4 mm driver delivers high-quality sound, all the way from low frequency bass to higher register tones.
Industry’s-leading 12-hour battery with 2.4 GHz connection

With the industry's longest battery life1, the INZONE Buds' L1 processor ensures up to 12 hours1 of play, and a staggering 24 hours with the charging case. Dive into extended, uninterrupted gaming sessions, powered to outlast your competition.
Quick charging if you're in a hurry
Spend more time gaming and less time charging. 5 minutes of charge will get you up to an hour of uninterrupted playtime.1
Wearing comfort and design
A truly wireless experience
Light-weight, small in size, and truly wireless, these earbuds are designed so that you'll forget you're even wearing them.
Lighter contact, greater comfort
Designed to be light-weight and reduce ear contact to maximize comfort.
Light mode or dark mode?
With two color options available, black and white, you can choose the one that best suits your style.
Low Latency allows enhanced precision
Every millisecond counts. With a USB-C® dongle connection, experience latency under 30ms so nothing stands in your way.
AI helps you be heard in the action

Let AI amplify improve your communication while in the action. The INZONE Buds employ an AI DNN (Deep Neural Network algorithm), crafted from over 500 million voice samples. This advanced AI noise reduction ensures your voice stands out, distinct from the surrounding ambient sounds.
Customizable controls

Intuitive and easy to operate, you can access useful controls with a tap of your finger. Through the INZONE Hub, you can customize and assign specific actions to your preference such as music playback and in-game volume adjustments.
Have it your way

Our INZONE Hub PC software allows you to personalize your INZONE Buds by customizing a wide range of operations, including a variety of sound and hardware settings and tap operation customization.2 Using the EQ function, fine-tune your game's sound frequencies for enhanced clarity and immersion.
One output for multiple devices
Seamless, low-latency audio across devices. The USB-C® dongle ensures the INZONE Buds effortlessly adapt to PCs, consoles, or mobile devices, offering versatile connectivity.
LE Audio Compatible
Sustainability
Sustainability in mind

Our products are designed with the environment in mind. There's no plastic in our INZONE Buds packaging, which uses recycled materials and non-woven cellulose, reflecting Sony’s commitment to reducing the environmental impact of our products and practices.
Aiming to achieve a zero environmental footprint

Inspired by the beauty of the world, we are doing our part to help preserve the Earth while still offering a superior sound and listening experience. With a goal of achieving a zero environmental footprint across the entire Sony Group by the year 2050, we are accelerating numerous initiatives for the environment.
Sony Electronics Inc. is the official pa: Encounter powerful summons with the INZONE M9 Gaming Monitor and INZONE Buds.
LE Audio Compatible: INZONE Buds are designed with LE Audio compatibility. This low-latency, energy-efficient connection ensures you enjoy up to 24 hours (up to 48 hours with case) of battery life, for longer immersion.INZONE Buds only support LE Audio connection (codec: LC3).Please note that the regular Bluetooth (Bluetooth Classic) codecs SBC, AAC, aptX and LDAC are not supported.LE Audio connection is currently not compatible with iPhone and iPad.
